document_data.name: Ippen
document_data.mainbody: '''Ippen''' was an early [[cleric]] of [[Gond]], who was later canonized by the [[Church of Gond]] as a saint of their faith.<ref group="note" name="saint">The sourcebook with the most detail on Ippen, ''[[Faiths & Avatars]]'', does not explicitly state that Ippen is a saint. Instead, this comes from them being the namesake of ''St.'' Ippen island. They were referred to by the Church as being Gond's "first great cleric"
document_data.Reputation:
* Ippen was notably the namesake of [[Ippensheir]], the sole calendar-related festival of the Church of Gond. Ippen was said to sometimes appear before Gondar clergy in need during this time.
* When missionaries from [[Lantan]] traveled to [[Maztica]], they named the largest island in the [[Green Sisters]] archipelago after them, [[St. Ippen (island)|St. Ippen]].
